Articles.Content: I am a coplete newbie to modding, and i realised i barely can create a simple model in anything. I wanted to ask - are there some free models?

Of course, there is models website like turbosquid, but you have to take care of usage for which model has been designed as a high-poly model will be too much for a game.

You can also get modelling tutorials on the web, they'll help.
There are also free modeling apps, such as Blender.

There are also free modeling apps, such as Blender.

Sorry if you just wanted to help, but do you think i am dumb?

Sorry if you just wanted to help, but do you think i am dumb?

No. I was intimating that you could also try making 3D models. Its fun, so I suggested Blender.

Edit: Glad that you are looking into using Blender. I think you will like it.

Edited February 21, 2014 by Dispatcher
